title: Kara No Shoujo (Innocent Grey) [VN18+] English Text + Jap Voice
description:
This is the mangagamer.com official translation of the visual novel developed by Innocent Grey. Includes full english text with added japanese voices(excluded from official release). Game is 18+ due to sexual graphics/scenes.

Description

The year is 1956; a series of bizarre murders rocks the city of Tokyo. Tokisaka Reiji, an ex-cop turned private eye, joins the investigation at the behest of his friend Uozumi Kyozo, a detective in the MPD. At the same time, he takes on a missing persons' case at a private all-girls high school, as well as a mysterious request from a girl named Toko to find her true self. As Reiji frantically struggles to crack the case, he learns that the murders bear an uncanny resemblance to a case in which his own fiancÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© was murdered six years ago. But try as he might, the body count just keeps rising...
